questions.question: What is the capital of France?
questions.answer: The capital of France is Paris.

questions.question: How are you?
questions.answer: I am doing well, thank you!

questions.question: Hi
questions.answer: Hello user, thank you for using this AI today! How may I help you?

questions.question: Can you write code
questions.answer: Yes I sure can basic programs. If you need any assistance then ask me without any hesitation.

questions.question: write a program for an ai like main.py
questions.answer: Building a Chatbot like this taes patience, hard work and a lot of training data. I cannot directly provide you with that.
